Reporting and Data Analytics Analyst* Responsible for performance analysis of reports and integrations.* Utilize various performance tools to analyze reports and integrations performance. Work with development team for bug fixes. QA fixes.* Collaborate with Support, Professional Services, Application, Environments teams to ensure customer implementation success.

Data Warehouse Migration Project * Analyzed source to target data requirements; identified the equivalent source data elements from the new Enterprise Data Warehouse model.* Responsible for converting current ETL mappings to utilize new data source systems.* Performed unit testing and data validation to ensure data accuracy post cut-off.* Identified data discrepancies and provided root cause analysis to support team for investigation and/or bug fixes.* Business Analyst of the Data Governance Data repository project. Worked with Business data owners to collect business data definitions and associated business definitions to the data warehouse data elements in the Enterprise meta data repository.
Sr. Enterprisewide Programmer and Business Systems Analyst

OBIEE and ETL Developer & Workday Integration Developer*	Managed and Administrated OBIEE platform of HR Analytics. *	Responsible for data modeling databases that support the HR Analytics dashboard.*	Developed and supported reports, charts in HR Analytics dashboard which were used by HR Generalists and Senior Management .  *	Responsible for Informatica ETL development, testing, and production support . *	Designed and developed Workday systems integration using Custom Reports, EIBs, Workday Studio, Cloud Connect and Document Transformation, XML, XPATH and XSLT.*	Successfully converted ETL mappings that previously used Peoplesoft data sources into using Workday HCM data source; integrating with the OBIEE HR Analytics data model.*	Created test cases and performed data validation during UAT phase of projects.*       Worked closely with HRIS business unit to collect and document requirements.*       Led weekly status meeting with IT and Business teams to keep track of issues and project status.
Sr. Enterprisewide Programmer and Business Systems Analyst

*	SME of HR self-service applications: Timesheets, Employee Tuition Assistance, Employee Recognition,  Bonus Administration. Worked with external Sass vendors to understand data structure and design data feed files.*	Created and modified reports and dashboards per HRIS requests.*	Constantly reviewed procedures and programs to  seek opportunities to streamline, automate and improve system performance.*	Responsible for troubleshooting data discrepancies, root cause analysis and implemented bug fixes.
Sr. Staff, Oracle and ETL Developer

* Managed Schwab Capital Market Finance data warehouse which supported management decision making and reporting needs. * ETL Developer: Proficient in Informatica PowerMart/PowerCenter,  Workflow Manager, Mapping Designer, Repository Manager, and all repository administrative functions. Utilized Informatica for data transformation, aggregation, and table load. Used Workflow Manager to construct batch jobs, establish task dependencies and job scheduling.* Designed, developed flat-file extracts, tables and database objects to support Finance and Trading Ops applications on different platforms (e.g. Essbase, ASP Web page, MS Access, and Crystal Reports).* Automated data feed and SQL load using PL/SQL and Unix shell scripts.
